title: Episode 208. “We make $157K at 22, but we’re afraid to spend money”
description: ﻿ Javier (22) and Marco (22) are young, ambitious, and financially disciplined—but the future they dream about together is being challenged by how they handle money today. They earn a combined income of $157,000, already have more than $60k invested, and live in New York City with shockingly low fixed costs. But despite their impressive […] Source
author: Ramit Sethi
